price: 9. Hagaajiya beegga si caadil ah, hana dhimina miisaanka.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-wazna bil-qis'ṭi walā tukh'sirū al-mīzāna
